summary: A drama about a boy who's inspired by Dr. Martin Luther King Jr. and challenges repressive school authority in 1969 Denmark.
cast: Bent Mejding|Anders W. Berthelsen|Jens Jørn Spottag|Anne-Grethe Bjarup Riis|Peter Hesse Overgaard|Sarah Juel Werner|Janus Dissing Rathke|Elin Reimer|Gyrd Løfquist|Lasse Borg|Daniel Ørum|Kurt Ravn|Steen Stig Lommer|Joy-Maria Frederiksen|Peter Schrøder|Tina Gylling Mortensen|Stig Hoffmeyer|Birgit Conradi|Lise Stegger|Nis Bank-Mikkelsen|Thomas Kim Hoder|Katrine Jensenius|Helle Merete Sørensen|John Lambreth|Helene Ravn Jedzini|Karen Jette Andersen|Annie Roed Frederiksen|Karen Skov Petersen|Sandra Å. Pedersen|Thomas Erikson
title: Drømmen
